name: Large Engagement Networks for Classifying Coordinated Campaigns and Organic Twitter Trends graph data
description: A dataset containing engagement networks for classifiying coordinated campaigns on Twitter containing graph data that can be loaded using networkx

feature.name: author.description
feature.description: This is the author's caption or description that is associated to each node

feature.name: text
feature.description: This is the text in the tweet, which has been retweeted, reposted or quoted. It is associated to an edge in the graph

feature.name: Interaction_Count
feature.description: The number of interactions between two users in graph.
